properties.query:
AzureDiagnostics 
| where Category == 'AzureFirewallApplicationRule' 
| where msg_s contains ' to ' 
| parse msg_s with 
    protocol:string 
    ' request from ' 
    srcIP:string ':' srcPort:int 
    ' to ' 
    dstIP:string ':' dstPort:int 
    '. Action: ' 
    action:string 
    '. ' 
    reason:string 
| project TimeGenerated, Resource, protocol, srcIP, srcPort, dstIP, dstPort, action, reason 
| union 
( 
AzureDiagnostics 
| where Category == 'AzureFirewallApplicationRule' 
| where msg_s !contains ' to ' 
| parse msg_s with 
    protocol:string 
    ' request from ' 
    srcIP:string ':' srcPort:int 
    '. Action: ' 
    action:string 
    '. ' 
    reason:string 
| project TimeGenerated, Resource, protocol, srcIP, srcPort, action, reason 
)
